original_info.name: Andrew Lloyd Webber: The Royal Albert Hall Celebration

review.name: OMG: A 100% Tasteful Andrew Lloyd Webber Extravaganza
review.reviewBody: Honestly, I think Cats is about the most revolting thing ever created by humankind so I didn't have high hopes (any hope) about this production. Well. I. Was. Wrong. This was one of the most tasteful, restrained, talent-full displays of musical prowess and choreography I've seen in a long time, with show-stopping renditions by Michael Bell (Gethsemane) and by Elaine Paige of that assumed-to-be-trite Memory from the aforementioned Cats. Stunned I was by how she (Elaine) breathed pure life into this song. Just Wow. The Dolby Digital 5.1 surround acquits this production beautifully. 100% recommended.
